page.title: 13Jobs in Burtle
page.content: When I went around the village of Burtle.I did a survey on what jobs people did for a living.I asked 39 people and most of them were House wives. The second most common are the farmers.They all own a lot of arable land and some had cows for milking. There were about five or more people who works for our school.Some of the older people were retired.A man who works at the village is called Mr Richards. There are two Pubs in the village. There is one member of the village which is in the R.A.F and he is a man who works on a aeroplane.There is some people who make there own ciders and sell it.There is one man who is a plasterer in {Street}.
